response.original_title: Brainstorm 2: Emcee Battle of the Year
response.overview: Only one emcee can claim the Brainstorm 2 title and the $2500 grand prize by verbally annihilating his opponents with vicious freestyles. Khalil Crisis aka Kingz seeks to defend his title while runner up Bishop I of Oldominion has revenge on his mind. With an expanded field of 64, Presence (Chicago, IL) and iCON (Philadelphia, PA) will pull every punch to upset the hometown favorites. However, Seattle area emcees H-Bomband Surge Spitable won't have any part of seeing the trophy leave the city in someone else's hands. Complete with footage of the prelims, round of 16, finals and the controversial Presence versus L-Dubble battle; this documentary includes live performances from Atmosphere, One Man Army of Binary Star and Eyedea & Abilities. But, the question remains -- who will get served, and who will survive Brainstorm2?
response.tagline: who will get served, and who will survive Brainstorm2?
response.title: Brainstorm 2: Emcee Battle of the Year
